snippet: Thomas James Brennan, a Marine, describes the difficulties he encountered when he sought help after trying to commit suicide.
abstract: Thomas James Brennan, a Marine, describes the difficulties he encountered when he sought help after trying to commit suicide.
lead_paragraph: “To the woman I love with my whole heart and soul: You are finally free of the terror I have caused in your life,” I wrote. “I am sorry for everything I have done to you. I deserve every bit of sorrow I feel.”

headline.main: My Suicide Attempt and My Struggles to Get Help

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
